game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the Serpent's Cave
game.description: An ancient artifact was stolen by a group of thieves and hidden in the Serpent's Cave. Your mission is to retrieve this artifact without alarming the serpents.
game.reward: 500 Gold coins and a magical sword

tasks.objective: Find the location of the Serpent's Cave
tasks.description: Investigate the thief's lair and find out the exact location of the Serpent's Cave.
Use your skills to sneak into the Serpent's Cave without alerting the serpents.
Search for the artifact without being noticed by the serpents.
